casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Jackson, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Jackson (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 104.]

(No. 94-1487 Submitted October 11, 1994 Decided December 7, 1994.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and L. Susan Laker, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Ishmael Jackson, pro se. *105 Per Curiam.

The decision of the court of appeals is affirmed for the reasons stated therein.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and • Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
